Class LBScanHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • pt.ulisboa.tecnico.cnv.scaling.loadbalancer.LBScanHandler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.sun.net.httpserver.HttpHandler

    public class LBScanHandler
extends java.lang.Object
implements com.sun.net.httpserver.HttpHandler
    Handles the Scan Requests that LoadBalancer receives from Clients.

        URL - WebServer URL that has the lowest associated Cost.

        Specified by:

      • sendRequest

        private void sendRequest(com.sun.net.httpserver.HttpExchange t,
               java.lang.String query,
               UserRequest uRequest)
                  throws java.io.IOException
        Forwards the Incoming Request to the WebServer that has the lowest associated Cost and adds the estimated Cost of the Request to it. When the WebServer responds, it responds to the Client with the Image that the WebServer returned and removes the Cost associated with the Request from the WebServer to which it forwarded the Request.
        Parameters:
        t - Encapsulates an HTTP Request.
        query - Incoming Request Query.
        uRequest - LoadBalancer Representation of the Incoming Request.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
